# üì∏ Pixly - AI Image Masterpiece Generator

Pixly is a free and open-source Android app that lets you generate stunning, high-quality images using reference photos. No logins, no limits ‚Äî just creativity.

---

## üì≤ Download Now

**[‚¨áÔ∏è Click here to download Pixly v4 APK](https://github.com/Kunal123a/Pixly/releases/download/v4/Pixly.v5.apk)**

---

## ‚ú® Features

- üé® Transform reference images into AI-generated masterpieces
- üîí 100% Free ‚Äî No login, no signup required
- üì∏ Face-preserving output (it keeps your features!)
- ü™∂ Lightweight and fast
- üöÄ No watermark, unlimited usage

---

## üõ† Built With

- **Kotlin** (Android)
- **Jetpack Compose** for UI
- **Glide** for image loading
- **Hugging Face IC-Light V2** API for AI-powered transformations

## üöß Installation Guide

1. Click the [Download APK](https://github.com/Kunal123a/Pixly/raw/main/Pixly%20v4.apk) button above.
2. Open the APK file on your Android device.
3. If prompted, allow installation from unknown sources.
4. Launch Pixly and start creating!
